// Example Legacy Maverick decklist
// Run: mtg-print build example.txt --interactive

Creatures
4 Noble Hierarch
4 Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
3 Knight of the Reliquary
2 Endurance
1 Collector Ouphe
1 Scavenging Ooze

Spells
4 Swords to Plowshares
4 Green Sun's Zenith
3 Once Upon a Time

Lands
4 Windswept Heath
3 Wooded Foothills
2 Savannah
1 Bayou
1 Dryad Arbor
1 Karakas
1 Gaea's Cradle
